verbs.description: [ARG0: An Indonesian court] [V: sentenced] [ARG1: a politician praised by President Donald Trump to 15 years in prison] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG3: for his role in the theft of $ 170 million of public money] .

An Indonesian court sentenced [ARG1: a politician] [V: praised] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] [ARG2: to 15 years in prison] on Tuesday [ARG3: for his role in the theft of $ 170 million of public money] .
